name: SOCIAL AWARNESS AND VOLUNTARY EDUCATION (SAVE) MICHEALPALAYAM

address: Dharapuram Road, Behind E. B. Office

briefDescription: SAVE was founded as a response in the year 1993 to the unfair and exploitative working conditions of garment workers, specifically the targeting of under age children and young women enslaving them as bonded labour and inhuman practices against women workers. SAVE is the oldest and most reputed organization working directly with workers and unions. SAVE has extensive experience in child protection and labour welfare. SAVE’s rescues child labourers and reintegrates them into the education system, SAVE’s efforts have benefited over 17,000 adolescents and women and reduced the number of children working in the spinning mills and garment industries. SAVE maintains 14 bridge schools for rescued child labourers and migrant children.

address: Batlagundu Road (H.N.U.P.R Matriculation Higher Secondary School)
